needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: To build the perfect pizza, a secret ingredient is not necessary, but a crucial component is "the word." This is a metaphor for the importance of ideas over words. Just as a river's algorithm finds the optimal path, a good idea should be pursued relentlessly, even if it seems "wrong."
